018package org.opengis.referencing.cs;
019
020import java.util.Map;
021import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
022import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
023
024
025/**
026 * A 2- or 3-dimensional coordinate system in Euclidean space with straight axes that are not necessarily orthogonal.
027 *
028 * <p>This type of <abbr>CS</abbr> can be used by coordinate reference systems of type
029 * {@link org.opengis.referencing.crs.EngineeringCRS}, potentially in combination with
030 * {@link org.opengis.referencing.crs.DerivedCRS}.</p>
031 *
032 * @author  OGC Topic 2 (for abstract model and documentation)
033 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD, Geomatys)
034 * @version 3.1
035 * @since   2.0
036 *
037 * @see CSFactory#createAffineCS(Map, CoordinateSystemAxis, CoordinateSystemAxis)
038 * @see CSFactory#createAffineCS(Map, CoordinateSystemAxis, CoordinateSystemAxis, CoordinateSystemAxis)
039 */
040@UML(identifier="AffineCS", specification=ISO_19111)
041public interface AffineCS extends CoordinateSystem {
042}
